Class SldEpidemic

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.advCards.sealed.SldAdvCard
org.mio.progettoingsoft.advCards.sealed.SldEpidemic
public final class SldEpidemic extends SldAdvCard
Abstract base class for all sealed advanced cards used in the game.

This class defines shared behaviors and interfaces for cards that introduce advanced interactions such as player choices, penalties, effects, and state transitions. Subclasses must implement specific behavior, especially for card initialization and name retrieval.

All sealed cards are required to extend this class and are governed by a predefined set of states.

    • loadEpidemic

      public static SldEpidemic loadEpidemic(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)
      Loads an SldEpidemic object from a JSON node. This static method parses the provided JsonNode to extract the necessary attributes (id and level) and constructs a new SldEpidemic instance.
      Parameters:
      node - The JsonNode containing the data for the epidemic card.
      Returns:
      A new SldEpidemic instance populated with data from the JSON node.
